\section{Introduction}

The {\Tt{}netout-mlab\nwendquote} function generates a Matlab structure from
the netlist data structure.


\section{Interface}

\nwfilename{netout-mlab.nw}\nwbegincode{1}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-4J0gJA-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-4J0gJA-1}}}\moddef{netout-mlab.h~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-4J0gJA-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
#ifndef NETOUT_MLAB_H
#define NETOUT_MLAB_H

#include <mex.h>

mxArray* netout_mlab(mesh_t mesh);

#endif /* NETOUT_MLAB_H */
\nwnotused{netout-mlab.h}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{2}\nwdocspar


\section{Implementation}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{3}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}}\moddef{netout-mlab.c~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
#include <sugar.h>

#include <mesh.h>
#include <netout.h>
#include <netout_mlab.h>

\subsection{Generator data structures}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{5}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-4H4VOG-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-4H4VOG-1}}}\moddef{types~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-4H4VOG-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
typedef struct netout_mlab_stack_t \{
    const char* name;
    char        type;
    const char* s;
    double*     d;
    int         m, n;
    struct netout_mlab_stack_t* next;
\} netout_mlab_stack_t;

typedef struct \{
    mempool_t pool;
    netout_mlab_stack_t* head;
    void* frame;
\} netout_mlab_t;

\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{6}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{7}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-1}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
netout_t* netout_mlab_create()
\{
    static netout_fun_t funs = \{
        write_string, write_double, write_int,
        write_double_matrix, write_int_matrix
    \};

    mempool_t      pool   = mempool_create(MEMPOOL_DEFAULT_SPAN);
    netout_t*      netout = mempool_cget(pool, sizeof(*netout));
    netout_mlab_t* self   = mempool_cget(pool, sizeof(*self));

    netout->methods = &funs;
    netout->data    = self;

    self->pool  = pool;
    self->head  = NULL;

    return netout;
\}

\nwalsodefined{\\{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-2}\\{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-3}\\{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-4}}\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{8}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{9}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-2}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-1}{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-3}\nwenddeflinemarkup
void netout_mlab_destroy(netout_t* self)
\{
    mempool_destroy(((netout_mlab_t*) (self->data))->pool);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{10}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{11}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-1}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static mxArray* netout_mlab_pack(netout_t* netout)
\{
    int i, n;
    netout_mlab_t*       self = netout->data;
    netout_mlab_stack_t* link;
    const char**         names;
    mxArray*             result;

    n = 0;
    for (link = self->head; link != NULL; link = link->next)
        ++n;

    i = 0;
    names = mxCalloc(n, sizeof(char*));
    for (link = self->head; link != NULL; link = link->next)
        names[i++] = link->name;

    result = mxCreateStructMatrix(1,1,n,names);
    mxFree(names);

    i = 0;
    for (link = self->head; link != NULL; link = link->next) \{
        mxArray* array;
        if (link->type == 's') \{
            array = mxCreateString(link->s);
        \} else if (link->type == 'd') \{
            array = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(link->m, link->n, mxREAL);
            memcpy(mxGetPr(array), link->d, link->m*link->n * sizeof(double));
        \} else \{
            mexErrMsgTxt("Error in netout -- unidentified argument type\\n");
        \}
        mxSetFieldByNumber(result, 0, i++, array);
    \}

    if (self->head) \{
        for (link = self->head; link->next != NULL; link = link->next);
        self->head = NULL;
        mempool_freeh(link);
    \}

    return result;
\}

\nwalsodefined{\\{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-2}\\{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-3}\\{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-4}\\{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-5}\\{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-6}\\{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-7}}\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{12}\nwdocspar


\subsection{{\Tt{}netout\nwendquote} functions}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{13}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-2}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-1}{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-3}\nwenddeflinemarkup
netout_mlab_stack_t* get_link(netout_mlab_t* self)
\{
    netout_mlab_stack_t* link;

    if (self->head == NULL)
        link = mempool_cgeth(self->pool, sizeof(*link));
    else
        link = mempool_cget(self->pool, sizeof(*link));

    link->next = self->head;
    self->head = link;

    return link;
\}

\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{14}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{15}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-3}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-3}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-2}{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-4}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void write_string(void* pself, const char* name, const char* s)
\{
    netout_mlab_t*       self = pself;
    netout_mlab_stack_t* link = get_link(self);

    link->name = mempool_strdup(self->pool, name);
    link->type = 's';
    link->s    = mempool_strdup(self->pool, s);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{16}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{17}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-4}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-4}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-3}{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-5}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void write_double_matrix(void* pself, const char* name, 
                                        double* data, int m, int n)
\{
    netout_mlab_t*       self = pself;
    netout_mlab_stack_t* link = get_link(self);

    link->name = mempool_strdup(self->pool, name);
    link->type = 'd';
    link->d    = mempool_cget(self->pool, m*n * sizeof(double));
    link->m    = m;
    link->n    = n;
    memcpy(link->d, data, m*n * sizeof(double));
\}

\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{18}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{19}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-5}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-5}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-4}{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-6}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void write_int_matrix(void* pself, const char* name, int* data,
                                     int m, int n)
\{
    int i;
    netout_mlab_t*       self = pself;
    netout_mlab_stack_t* link = get_link(self);

    link->name = mempool_strdup(self->pool, name);
    link->type = 'd';
    link->d    = mempool_cget(self->pool, m*n * sizeof(double));
    link->m    = m;
    link->n    = n;
    for (i = 0; i < m*n; ++i)
        link->d[i] = *data++;
\}

\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{20}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{21}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-6}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-6}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-5}{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-7}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void write_int(void* pself, const char* name, int i)
\{
    write_int_matrix(pself, name, &i, 1, 1);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{22}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{23}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-7}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-7}}}\moddef{static functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW2dxFXX-1duChy-6}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void write_double(void* pself, const char* name, double d)
\{
    write_double_matrix(pself, name, &d, 1, 1);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{24}\nwdocspar


\subsection{Transferring data structures}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{25}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-3}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-3}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-2}{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-4}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mxArray* netout_mlab_node(netout_t* netout, mesh_node_t* node)
\{
    if (node->name)
        netout_string(netout, "name", node->name);
    netout_double_matrix(netout, "x", node->x, 1, 3);
    return netout_mlab_pack(netout);
\}

mxArray* netout_mlab_element(netout_t* netout, element_t* element)
\{
    element_output(element, netout);
    return netout_mlab_pack(netout);
\}

mxArray* netout_mlab_material(netout_t* netout, material_t* material)
\{
    material_output(material, netout);
    return netout_mlab_pack(netout);
\}

\nwused{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{26}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{27}\sublabel{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-4}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-4}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW2dxFXX-2EZBwy-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW2dxFXX-nRuDO-3}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mxArray* netout_mlab(mesh_t mesh)
\{
    const char* names[] = \{"node", "material", "element"\};
    int i, n;

    mxArray* nodes     = mxCreateCellMatrix(mesh_num_nodes(mesh),     1);
    mxArray* materials = mxCreateCellMatrix(mesh_num_materials(mesh), 1);
    mxArray* elements  = mxCreateCellMatrix(mesh_num_elements(mesh),  1);
    mxArray* netlist   = mxCreateStructMatrix(1, 1, 3, names);

    netout_t* self = netout_mlab_create();

    n = mesh_num_nodes(mesh);
    for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) \{
        mesh_node_t* node = mesh_node(mesh, i+1);
        mxArray* data = netout_mlab_node(self, node);
        mxSetCell(nodes, i, data);
    \}

    n = mesh_num_materials(mesh);
    for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) \{
        mxArray* data = netout_mlab_material(self, mesh_material(mesh, i+1));
        mxSetCell(materials, i, data);
    \}

    n = mesh_num_elements(mesh);
    for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) \{
        mxArray* data = netout_mlab_element(self, mesh_element(mesh, i+1));
        mxSetCell(elements, i, data);
    \}

    mxSetFieldByNumber(netlist, 0, 0, nodes);
    mxSetFieldByNumber(netlist, 0, 1, materials);
    mxSetFieldByNumber(netlist, 0, 2, elements);

    netout_mlab_destroy(self);

    return netlist;
\}
